dependencies.description:
anndata is a Python package for handling annotated data matrices in
memory and on disk, positioned between pandas and xarray.
dependencies.name: py-anndata

dependencies.description:
The h5py package provides both a high- and low-level interface to the
HDF5 library from Python.
dependencies.name: py-h5py

dependencies.description:
Jinja2 is a template engine written in pure Python. It provides a Django
inspired non-XML syntax but supports inline expressions and an optional
sandboxed environment.
dependencies.name: py-jinja2

dependencies.description: Work with Loom files for single-cell RNA-seq data.
dependencies.name: py-loompy

dependencies.description: Reusable tools for working with next-generation sequencing (NGS) data.
dependencies.name: py-ngs-tools

dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.
dependencies.name: py-numpy

dependencies.description:
pandas is a fast, powerful, flexible and easy to use open source data
analysis and manipulation tool, built on top of the Python programming
language.
dependencies.name: py-pandas

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description: An interactive, browser-based graphing library for Python
dependencies.name: py-plotly

dependencies.description:
Scanpy is a scalable toolkit for analyzing single-cell gene expression
data built jointly with anndata.
dependencies.name: py-scanpy

dependencies.description: A set of python modules for machine learning and data mining.
dependencies.name: py-scikit-learn

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description:
The typing_extensions module contains both backports of these changes as
well as experimental types that will eventually be added to the typing
module, such as Protocol (see PEP 544 for details about protocols and
static duck typing).
dependencies.name: py-typing-extensions

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

description: Python wrapper around kallisto | bustools for scRNA-seq analysis.
name: py-kb-python
